text: <http://siteground.com|siteground.com> users heads up they’re having an issue with renewing certs with Let’s Encrypt. You might want to check your sites if you have any hosted there (just had a couple fail)
I havent used siteground in years!
They were one of my first hosting companies

They’ve honestly been my favorite host.

Tried bluehost, x10hosting, godaddy(not by choice),hostgator, wpengine, and like 4 others I can’t think of right now

Nice save there Jon.
What's seperated Siteground out for you? Most of our non-HS clients are on Bluehost now, but I've noticed their once-great support fall off a bit in the last year or so. We're already moving to namecheap or domain registration, but are also curious about trying a better web hosting service potentially.

SiteGround’s support is hands down the best of any host I’ve used. 

They tend to go above and beyond. Heck half the time a client has a hosting related issue I just ask them to do it instead of doing it myself, even if I can.

Saves me time to do something more important, makes me happy, makes client happy
they even do general wordpress support and stuff, plus I like their wordpress tools.
Damn, that's awesome... Next WP project I was thinking of hosting on Digital Ocean and just managing the virtual server myself, but now I might have to give them a try instead...
For WP hosting, we always loved the features and support of Flywheel out of Nebraska. They have also built tools to allow agencies to better manage client sites/white label/custom pricing, etc.
heard a lot about flywheel never tried em. They advertise on ShopTalk Show a lot

Flywheel is another one I've researched. We've used their "Local" product before and were impressed, and I love their design trends email series (if you haven't seen it: <https://getflywheel.com/design-trends-2018/>), but haven't had a chance to try out the hosting yet. Would love to try them out if the right project came up though.
That was a good series. I was on WP Engine and switched to Flywheel a few months ago. I love it so far.
